duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive business development strategies to expand US markets within the Semiconductor, Defense, and Healthcare industries.
Partner with the Managing Director to establish regional business office planning, budgets, staffing, and revenue goals.
Identify and develop new business opportunities at large corporate customers within target industries.
Build relationships with customers, partners, and headquarters for long-term growth.
Track emerging markets and trends, providing advice on product development, distribution, and promotion strategies.
Fulfill requests for proposals (RFPs) from potential partners and customers.

education_certification.credential: BS Engineering or Management, MBA Preferred
